author: Julio Xoxocotla
description: The subtly smoky notes of mezcal combine brilliantly with the aromatic bitter sweetness of gentian liqueur in this fabulously complex aperitif cocktail.
name: Maximiliano Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 22.5 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
2.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice
